description: This file defines a Knockout.js ViewModel for a Todo application, managing todos including add, remove, edit, and persistence functionalities.

classes.name: ViewModel
classes.description: Main view model managing the list of todos and user interactions.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new todo item to the list if the current input is not empty.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a specified todo item from the list.

methods.name: editItem
methods.description: Enables editing mode for a specific todo item.

methods.name: stopEditing
methods.description: Stops editing a todo item, updates title, and removes if empty.

methods.name: cancelEditing
methods.description: Cancels editing and reverts to previous title.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns 'item' or 'items' based on the count.
